Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor's walk in the eighth inning set off a rally for the Mets
Pete Alonso hit a go-ahead, three-run homer in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Cohen expressed that the 2-0 score felt like 10-0
Brandon Nimmo praised Francisco Lindor's professionalism and at-bat in the eighth inning
David Stearns highlighted Francisco Lindor's impact on the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets won their first playoff series since taking the 2015 pennant
The Mets had to overcome a deficit in both victories in the series
Others: Jose Quintana offered six innings of changeups and guts, holding the Brewers hitless in 11 at-bats with men on base to keep a scoreless tie
The Mets' bullpen nearly cost them the series in May but was fixed by the end of the season
